extensionName: Streaming enhanced: Netflix Disney+ Prime Video
extensionDescription: Skip ads, intros, credits and add adjust speed, etc. on Netflix, Prime video, Disney+, Crunchyroll and HBO max.
sharedSettingsDescription: These options will only enable/disable the {0} part of the shared setting
defaultfilterPaidDescription: Removing every paid movie/series category from Amazon prime
sharedPageDescription: These options will only enable/disable the settings for all streaming services. In the below table you can disable the shared settings for a specific service
skipIntroDescription: Skipping the intros and recaps of any series. Except Netflix since there Recaps cannot be watched again.
skipCreditsDescription: Skipping to the next episode of every series as fast as possible
skipAdDescription: Skipping freevee ads for amazon and all of the ads in the basic Netflix tier
fullscreenDescription: If a video is put on fullscreen, the video will play automatically
selfAdDescription: Skipping the prime show previews which are shown before any video
continuePositionDescription: Move category "Continue" to the top of the page
skipBlockedDescription: Resumes the video if the 'Are you still watching' prompt is shown
profileDescription: The last used profile is directly chosen when the page is launched
amazonAdDescription: Time of skipped FreeVee Ads + Prime Video Self Ads
statisticIntroDescription: Time of skipped Intros on Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
statisticskipRecapDescription: Time of skipped Recaps on Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
statisticSegmentsDescription: Amount of Individual Segments Skipped like an Intro or an Ad for Netflix, Amazon and Disney+
watchCreditsDescription: Always watch the credits of every series
showRatingDescription: Adding the TMDB rating to every movie and series
releaseCalendarDescription: Adds the checkboxes 'Show Playlists only' and 'Filter DUB' to the release calendar
epilepsyDescription: Darken the screen when skipping the ad
userAgentDescription: For prime video and disney+ change to the Desktop website and for amazon make the site mobile friendly
xrayDescription: Hide the Xray Quick View over a video
autoOpenDescription: If on streaming site open the according settings in popup automatically
duplicateDescription: Remove every duplicate show, which was already visible on Disney before. Visible means that the show is in the first 5 shows in every row
bigPlayerDescription: Extends the video size to the entire browser window without full screen.
disableNumpadDescription: Disable the numpad keys so you don't accidentally change the current video time/position.
doubleClickDescription: If you double click on the video it will go to fullscreen.
scrollVolumeDescription: Scrolling up or down on the Sound Icon will change the volume.
showYearDescription: Shows the release year next to the rating.
installThanks: Thank you for installing Streaming enhanced! ‚ù§Ô∏è
tabsPermission: necessary for the automatic opening of the correct settings
affiliateDescription: If a page with affiliate link is open, shows popup to apply affiliate link, like for amazon prime.
removeGamesDescription: Removes all games from the page.
hideTitlesDescription: Automatically hide shows, which were hidden by the user manually.
skipIntroDelayDescription: Some languages talk longer than others. This setting allows you to skip the intro with a delay such that in some dubs the speech is not cut off.
resetConfirm:
You want to reset the Settings.

Are you sure you want to do this?
invalidJson: The file you uploaded is not a valid JSON file.
improveUIDescription: Enhanced Video Player UI in various ways.
skipAfterCreditsDescription: Skip Outro and After Outro Scene on Crunchyroll.
